name: Indomie
description: Indomie Instant Noodles is served without soup and is stirred well with soysauce, oil, and seasoning.

name: Shawarma
description: Shawarma is a popular Middle Eastern dish that originated in the Ottoman Empire, consisting of meat cut into thin slices, stacked in an inverted cone, and roasted on a slowly turning vertical rotisserie or spit.

name: Strawberry Ice Cream
description: This Homemade Strawberry Ice Cream is creamy, dreamy, and made with fresh strawberries. Itâ€™s an old fashioned strawberry ice cream recipe that makes it the perfect spring or summer dessert.
